name: dexswap-subgraph
description: subgraph sample for Rinkeby || Matic || Moonbeam

scripts.deploy-local:rinkeby: graph deploy agin-dropdisco/dexswapnew subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-local:mainnet: graph deploy agin-dropdisco/dexswapnew subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy agin-dropdisco/dexsw-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token  --debug
scripts.deploy:matic: graph deploy agin-dropdisco/dexswap-matic subgraph.matic.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token  --debug
scripts.deploy:moonbeam: graph deploy agin-dropdisco/dexswap-moonbeam subgraph.moonbeam.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token  --debug
